title: My Brother's Bomber, Pan Am 103, and 57 Gatwick
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Media - Today 
On December 21, 1988, a Boeing 747 named Clipper Maid of the Seas, rumbled away from London's Heathrow airport. It was shortly before 6:30 i...
